arts.ttl: Hoffenheim spoil Erik ten Hag's Bundesliga debut with clinical away win at Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Hoffenheim opened their season with an impressive 2-1 away victory over Bayer Leverkusen in Erik ten Hag's Bundesliga debut as head coach, with goals from Fisnik Asllani and Tim Lemperle overturning Jarell Quansah's early opener. Leverkusen responded quickly, though, taking the lead after six minutes when Bundesliga debutant Quansah powered home a downward header from Alejandro Grimaldo's teasing free-kick.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen stunned as Asllani inspires Hoffenheim win
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen welcomed TSG Hoffenheim to the atmospheric BayArena this afternoon. In both club's first Bundesliga game of the season, it ended in a shock 2-1 win for the visitors.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs. TSG Hoffenheim preview: Leverkusen aim for positive start to Erik ten Hag era
arts.sum: Last season's Bundesliga runners-up Bayer Leverkusen are entering a new era under Erik ten Hag, and they take on Hoffenheim at the BayArena to open their 2025/26 campaign.
